document_data.name: Hoseki
document_data.mainbody: '''Hoseki''' was a disguised [[sohei]] follower of the [[Dai-Oni (tengu)|dai-oni]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Hoseki was a sohei of the [[Black Temple]]. In 1357 DR, Hoseki posed as a farmer living in [[Myudo]] village, a village under the dai-oni's control, to spy on the inhabitants. He noticed some adventurers who'd arrived at the village and asked to sleep in his house for night. In the night, Hoseki led his men in trying to kill them but was defeated.
